title: Athens unholy grail typo error! (I think)
body:
{{item:3174}} 
the unique passive **harmony** says bonus % base regen rather than just bonus regen. I dont think it applies base regen anyway.

replies.body: It can be a little confusing sometimes, but that stat does actually scale off of your **base** mana regen. The reason it's built that way is so that you don't end up getting an ungodly amount of mana regen when stacking other items that can increase it beyond the base amount.
Oh! Thank you for the clarification.
